summary: This is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York Daily Activity Report for July 30, 2019. It documents the removal of inmate Jeffrey Epstein from psychological observation and his placement in the Special Housing Unit (SHU), as well as general facility operations, staffing, and inmate population counts.

events.title: Epstein Removed from Psych Observation to SHU
events.description: Inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) was removed from psychological observation and housed on the Special Housing Unit (SHU).

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein (inmate #76318-054) was removed from psychological observation and placed in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) on July 30, 2019.
The report notes staffing shortages leading to unassigned correctional officer posts in the SHU and other units.
The total inmate population at the MCC New York at the beginning of the morning watch shift on July 30, 2019, was 767.
Inmate Melendez (#85799-054) was at an outside hospital under guard by the U.S. Marshals Service (USMS).
